00039 #include "egs_alias_table.h"
00040 #include "egs_functions.h"
00041 
00042 void EGS_AliasTable::clear() {
00043     if (n > 0) {
00044         delete [] fi;
00045         delete [] xi;
00046         delete [] wi;
00047         delete [] bin;
00048         n = 0;
00049     }
00050 }
00051 
00052 void EGS_AliasTable::allocate(int N, int Type) {
00053     clear();
00054     n = N;
00055     type = Type;
00056     xi = new EGS_Float [n];
00057     if (type == 0) {
00058         np = n;
00059         fi = new EGS_Float [n];
00060         wi = new EGS_Float [n];
00061         bin = new int [n];
00062     }
00063     else {
00064         np = n-1;
00065         wi = new EGS_Float [n-1];
00066         bin = new int [n-1];
00067         if (type == 1) {
00068             fi = new EGS_Float [n-1];
00069         }
00070         else {
00071             fi = new EGS_Float [n];
00072         }
00073     }
00074 }
00075 
00076 
00077 void EGS_AliasTable::copy(const EGS_AliasTable &t) {
00078     clear();
00079     if (t.n > 0) {
00080         allocate(t.n,t.type);
00081         for (int j=0; j<np; j++) {
00082             xi[j] = t.xi[j];
00083             fi[j] = t.fi[j];
00084             wi[j] = t.wi[j];
00085             bin[j] = t.bin[j];
00086         }
00087         if (type) {
00088             xi[np] = t.xi[np];
00089             if (type == 2 || type == 3) {
00090                 fi[np] = t.fi[np];
00091             }
00092         }
00093     }
00094 }
00095 
00096 /**************************************************
00097       Initializes alias-table:
00098       N = number of abscissa points
00099 **************************************************/
00100 void EGS_AliasTable::initialize(int N, const EGS_Float *x,
00101                                 const EGS_Float *f, int Type) {
00102     allocate(N,Type);
00103     for (int i=0; i<np; i++) {
00104         xi[i] = x[i];
00105         fi[i] = f[i];
00106     }
00107     if (Type) {
00108         xi[np] = x[np];
00109     }
00110     if (Type == 2 || Type == 3) {
00111         fi[np] = f[np];
00112     }
00113     make();
00114 }
00115 
00116 void EGS_AliasTable::make() {
00117     EGS_Float *fcum = new EGS_Float[np];
00118     bool *not_done = new bool[np];
00119     EGS_Float sum = 0, sum1 = 0;
00120     int i;
00121     for (i=0; i<np; i++) {
00122         if (type == 0) {
00123             fcum[i] = fi[i];
00124         }
00125         else if (type == 1) {
00126             fcum[i] = fi[i]*(xi[i+1]-xi[i]);
00127         }
00128         else {
00129             fcum[i] = 0.5*(fi[i]+fi[i+1])*(xi[i+1]-xi[i]);
00130         }
00131         //egsWarning("i=%d fcum=%g x=%g f=%g\n",i,fcum[i],xi[i],fi[i]);
00132         sum += fcum[i];
00133         wi[i] = 1;
00134         bin[i] = 0;
00135         not_done[i] = true;
00136         wi[i] = 1;
00137         if (type == 0) {
00138             sum1 += fcum[i]*xi[i];
00139         }
00140         else if (type == 1) {
00141             sum1 += 0.5*fcum[i]*(xi[i+1]+xi[i]);
00142         }
00143         else sum1 += fcum[i]*(fi[i]*(2*xi[i]+xi[i+1])+
00144                                   fi[i+1]*(xi[i]+2*xi[i+1]))/(3*(fi[i]+fi[i+1]));
00145     }
00146     average = sum1/sum;
00147     for (i=0; i<np; i++) {
00148         fi[i] /= sum;
00149     }
00150     if (type == 2 || type == 3) {
00151         fi[np] /= sum;
00152     }
00153     sum /= np;
00154     int jh, jl;
00155     //egsWarning("np = %d sum = %g average = %g\n",np,sum,average);
00156     for (i=0; i<np-1; i++) {
00157         for (jh=0; jh<np-1; jh++) {
00158             if (not_done[jh] && fcum[jh] > sum) {
00159                 break;
00160             }
00161         }
00162         for (jl=0; jl<np-1; jl++) {
00163             if (not_done[jl] && fcum[jl] < sum) {
00164                 break;
00165             }
00166         }
00167         //egsWarning(" fcum[%d] = %g fcum[%d] = %g\n",jh,fcum[jh],jl,fcum[jl]);
00168         EGS_Float aux = sum - fcum[jl];
00169         fcum[jh] -= aux;
00170         not_done[jl] = false;
00171         wi[jl] = fcum[jl]/sum;
00172         bin[jl] = jh;
00173         //egsWarning(" for %d wi = %g jh = %d\n",jl,wi[jl],bin[jl]);
00174     }
00175     delete [] fcum;
00176     delete [] not_done;
00177 }
00178 
00179 #define AT_NCHECK 3
00180 
00181 int EGS_AliasTable::initialize(EGS_Float xmin, EGS_Float xmax, EGS_Float accu,
00182                                int nmax, EGS_AtFunction f, void *data) {
00183     allocate(2,2);
00184     xi[0] = xmin;
00185     xi[1] = xmax;
00186     fi[0] = f(xi[0],data);
00187     fi[1] = f(xi[1],data);
00188     EGS_Float *xtemp, *ftemp;
00189     int error = 0;
00190     while (1) {
00191         int nnn = (n-1)*AT_NCHECK + n;
00192         xtemp = new EGS_Float[nnn];
00193         ftemp = new EGS_Float[nnn];
00194         if (!xtemp || !ftemp) egsFatal("EGS_AliasTable::initialize: "
00195                                            "not enough memory!\n");
00196         bool is_ok = true;
00197         int i,j=0;
00198         for (i=0; i<n-1; i++) {
00199             xtemp[j] = xi[i];
00200             ftemp[j] = fi[i];
00201             EGS_Float dx = (xi[i+1]-xi[i])/(AT_NCHECK+1);
00202             for (int l=0; l<AT_NCHECK; l++) {
00203                 EGS_Float x = xi[i]+dx*(l+1);
00204                 EGS_Float fe = f(x,data);
00205                 EGS_Float fa = fi[i]+(fi[i+1]-fi[i])/(xi[i+1]-xi[i])*(x-xi[i]);
00206                 EGS_Float test = fabs(fa/fe-1);
00207                 if (test > accu) {
00208                     is_ok = false;
00209                     xtemp[++j] = x;
00210                     ftemp[j] = fe;
00211                 }
00212             }
00213             j++;
00214         }
00215         if (is_ok) {
00216             break;
00217         }
00218         xtemp[j] = xi[n-1];
00219         ftemp[j++] = fi[n-1];
00220         allocate(j,2);
00221         for (i=0; i<j; i++) {
00222             xi[i] = xtemp[i];
00223             fi[i] = ftemp[i];
00224         }
00225         if (n >= nmax) {
00226             error = 1;
00227             break;
00228         }
00229         delete [] xtemp;
00230         delete [] ftemp;
00231     }
00232     delete [] xtemp;
00233     delete [] ftemp;
00234     make();
00235     return error;
00236 }
00237 
00238 int EGS_AliasTable::sampleBin(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00239     EGS_Float r1 = rndm->getUniform();
00240     EGS_Float aj = r1*np;
00241     int j = (int) aj;
00242     aj -= j;
00243     if (aj > wi[j]) {
00244         j = bin[j];
00245     }
00246     return j;
00247 }
00248 
00249 EGS_Float EGS_AliasTable::sample(EGS_RandomGenerator *rndm) const {
00250     EGS_Float r1 = rndm->getUniform();
00251     EGS_Float aj = r1*np;
00252     int j = (int) aj;
00253     aj -= j;
00254     if (aj > wi[j]) {
00255         j = bin[j];
00256     }
00257     if (!type) {
00258         return xi[j];
00259     }
00260     EGS_Float x = xi[j];
00261     EGS_Float dx = xi[j+1] - x;
00262     EGS_Float r2 = rndm->getUniform();
00263     if (type == 1) {
00264         return x + dx*r2;
00265     }
00266     EGS_Float res;
00267     if (fi[j] > 0) {
00268         EGS_Float a = fi[j+1]/fi[j]-1;
00269         if (fabs(a) < 0.2) {
00270             EGS_Float rnno1 = 0.5*(1-r2)*a;
00271             res = x + r2*dx*(1+rnno1*(1-r2*a));
00272         }
00273         else {
00274             res = x - dx/a*(1-sqrt(1+r2*a*(2+a)));
00275         }
00276     }
00277     else {
00278         res = x + dx*sqrt(r2);
00279     }
00280     return res;
00281 }
00282 
00283 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::EGS_SimpleAliasTable(int N, const EGS_Float *f) : n(0) {
00284     if (N < 1) {
00285         return;
00286     }
00287     n = N;
00288     wi = new EGS_Float [n];
00289     bins = new int [n];
00290     int i;
00291     double sum = 0;
00292     double *fcum = new double [n];
00293     for (i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00294         fcum[i] = f[i];
00295         sum += fcum[i];
00296         bins[i] = n+1;
00297     }
00298     sum /= n;
00299     int jh, jl;
00300     //egsInformation("n=%d sum=%g\n",n,sum);
00301     int jh_old = 0, jl_old = 0;
00302     for (i=0; i<n-1; ++i) {
00303         for (jh=jh_old; jh<n-1; jh++) {
00304             if (bins[jh] > n && fcum[jh] > sum) {
00305                 break;
00306             }
00307         }
00308         if (fcum[jh_old] < sum && jh_old < jl_old) {
00309             jl = jh_old;
00310         }
00311         else {
00312             for (jl=jl_old; jl<n-1; jl++) {
00313                 if (bins[jl] > n && fcum[jl] < sum) {
00314                     break;
00315                 }
00316             }
00317             jl_old = jl;
00318         }
00319         double aux = sum - fcum[jl];
00320         fcum[jh] -= aux;
00321         wi[jl] = fcum[jl]/sum;
00322         bins[jl] = jh;
00323         //egsInformation("i=%d jh=%d jl=%d w=%g\n",i,jh,jl,wi[jl]);
00324         jh_old = jh; //jl_old = jl;
00325     }
00326     for (i=0; i<n; ++i) {
00327         if (bins[i] > n) {
00328             bins[i] = i;
00329             wi[i] = 1;
00330         }
00331         //egsInformation("alias table: %d %d %g\n",i,bins[i],wi[i]);
00332     }
00333     delete [] fcum;
00334 }
00335 
00336 EGS_SimpleAliasTable::~EGS_SimpleAliasTable() {
00337     if (n > 0) {
00338         delete [] wi;
00339         delete [] bins;
00340     }
00341 }
